name: TICKET_PASS_DTREES
description: This table stores decision tree answers completed as part of the Ticket Pass workflow.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TP_COMPLETED_DTREE_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: Stores decision trees that were silently completed as part of the Ticket Pass search and offer phase.
